name: Book Explorer
tagline: iOS App to discover books and authors
body:
##Welcome to Book Explorer
![icon](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/buele/BookExplorer/master/docs/screenshots/icon.png)


###Introduction
Book Explorer is an open source iOS App to discover books and authors, using google freebase api.


[Freebase](http://www.freebase.com) is a large collaborative knoledge base consisting of metadata composed mainly by its community members (Wikipedia).

The Freebase  APIs allow to tap into [Google's Knoledge Graph](http://www.google.com/insidesearch/features/search/knowledge.html)


###The App
![home](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/buele/BookExplorer/master/docs/screenshots/home.png)


#####Discover books and authors details, using the search box:
![editing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/buele/BookExplorer/master/docs/screenshots/editing.png)


#####Results by keyword will appear:
![results](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/buele/BookExplorer/master/docs/screenshots/results.png)


#####Select a Topic and enjoy your curiosity:
![topic](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/buele/BookExplorer/master/docs/screenshots/topic.png)



###iOS version
iOS 7


###License
**Book Explorer** is licensed under [MIT license](http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT). 
So you can do whatever you want to with it, enjoy!


###Source code
[Source code](https://github.com/buele/BookExplorer)


###Authors and Contributors
- Designed by @buele and @nike 
- Developed by @buele 
- Reviewed by @vascaman
